name: Space Grind
description:
Frogger meets Fix-it Feelix meets Asteroids in a Corporation Lackey Nightmare that places you, an escape pod maintenance man, in the role of basejumping from space down to the surface to repair and recover escape pods for your penny-pinching employer. Dodge expansive fields of space junk as you descend to the planets surface. Put out fires, repair circuits, navigate damaged girders as you repair each escape craft, then dodge more space junk as you return the ship to the hangar.

Made in 48 hours for Global Game Jam 2020 in Omaha, Nebraska.

Game Design, Game Programming:  Chris Fibich

Game Design, Artwork, Sound Effects:  Ryan Malm

In-Game Music; Jaymeson Pon

Controls (keyboard)

  • Arrow keys for movement
  • X key to jump
  • Z key to interact

Controls (gamepad)

  • Dpad / Joystick for movement
  • A button to jump
  • B button to interact
